articles.description: WhatsApp users on Android will not be able to have an unlimited backup option on Google Drive soon.
articles.content: New Delhi: WhatsApp users on Android will not be able to have an unlimited backup option on Google Drive soon. As per a report by WhatsApp beta tracker WABetaInfo, Google Drive might put a limit to t… [+1062 chars]

articles.title: Asus ExpertBook B5 Flip OLED (B5302) With 11th-Gen Intel Core Processor, Up to 12 Hours Battery Launched ... - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Asus ExpertBook B5 Flip OLED (B5302) was launched in India on Wednesday. The new Asus laptop comes with a 360-degree hinge design and is equipped with an anti-glare HDR OLED display. It is also rated to deliver up to 12 hours of battery life on a single charg…
